title: Strengthening E-Learning Practical Skills: Problem-Solving Ability Improvement Program through Example-Based Language Learning

context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain language problem-solving procedures with over 80% accuracy through example-problem sequence learning models
Learners successfully resolve language problem scenarios presented in VR simulations at least twice out of three attempts
Learners rate the effectiveness of example-based learning strategies at 3.5 or higher on a 4-point scale in formative assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
